product_name: Continental Cyclo X King Foldable Tire - 700 x 32
long_description: Continental Cyclo X King foldable bike tire features a versatile, fast-rolling tread pattern for cyclocross training and racing. Black Chili rubber compound and small knob tread pattern delivers excellent all-around performance, supplying great traction and quick rolling. High-quality 180 tpi nylon casing offers a flexible, supple ride quality; very thin and durable rubber coating adds an extra layer of puncture resistance. Continental Cyclo X King foldable bike tire has a recommended pressure of 45 psi (3.1 bar) and a maximum of 85 psi (5.8 bar).
short_description: Continental Cyclo X King foldable bike tire features a versatile, fast-rolling tread pattern for cyclocross training and racing.
